refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This mode is used when processing the child elements of a biblioentry element. Many elements are treated differently when they appear inside a bibliography entry.

listitem.para: The biblioentry or bibliomixed element to generate a label for

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This outputs a label to be placed inline at the beginning of a bibliography entry. Labels are created for both biblioentry and bibliomixed elements. The label is typically an abbreviation of the authors' names an the year of publication. In DocBook, it is usually provides with a leading abbrev element. Without a leading abbrev element, this template will instead use the xreflabel or id attribute.
